attributes.action: Give Immediate Military Assistance to The DRC and MONUC Forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: a petition to get the PM to immediately deploy combat forces to the Congo to assist the fledging DRC army and UN MONUC forces to prevent a wider conflict in africa and avert a humanitarian disaster

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
